committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: To provide that the Appraisal Subcommittee of the Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council has the same status as the Council.

summary.text: Appraisal Subcommittee Status Act - Provides that certain funds received or collected by the Appraisal Subcommittee of the Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council shall not be construed to be Government funds or appropriated moneys and shall not be apportioned under any statutory authority (thus giving the Subcommittee the same status as the Council).

titles.title: To provide that the Appraisal Subcommittee of the Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council has the same status as the Council.
